verses.verse: Then <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> for the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and for their <S%H7218>heads<s%> and their <S%H8199>judges<s%> and their <S%H7860>officers;<s%> and they <S%H3320>presented<s%> themselves <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> 'From <S%H5769>ancient<s%> <S%H5769>times<s%> your fathers <S%H1>lived<s%> <S%H3427>beyond<s%> the <S%H5676>River,<s%> [namely,] <S%H5104>Terah,<s%> the father of <S%H8646>Abraham<s%> and the father of <S%H1>Nahor,<s%> and they <S%H85>served<s%> <S%H1>other<s%> <S%H5152>gods.<s%>

'Then I <S%H3947>took<s%> your father <S%H1>Abraham<s%> from <S%H85>beyond<s%> <S%H4480><s%> the <S%H5676>River,<s%> and <S%H5104>led<s%> him through <S%H1980>all<s%> the <S%H3605>land<s%> of <S%H776>Canaan,<s%> and <S%H3667>multiplied<s%> his <S%H7235>descendants<s%> and <S%H2233>gave<s%> him <S%H5414>Isaac.<s%>

'And to <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> I <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> and <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> and to <S%H6215>Esau<s%> I <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it; but <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

'Then I <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and I <S%H5062>plagued<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> by <S%H834>what<s%> I <S%H6213>did<s%> in its <S%H7130>midst;<s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> I <S%H3318>brought<s%> you out.

'And I <S%H3318>brought<s%> your fathers out of <S%H1>Egypt,<s%> and you <S%H4714>came<s%> to the <S%H935>sea;<s%> and <S%H3220>Egypt<s%> <S%H4714>pursued<s%> your fathers with <S%H7291>chariots<s%> and <S%H1>horsemen<s%> to the <S%H7393>Red<s%> <S%H6571><s%> <S%H5488>Sea.<s%>

'But when they <S%H6817>cried<s%> out to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> He <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H3990>darkness<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> you and the <S%H4713>Egyptians,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> upon them and <S%H3680>covered<s%> them; and your own <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> I <S%H6213>did<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> And you <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> for a <S%H7227>long<s%> <S%H3117>time.<s%>

'Then I <S%H935>brought<s%> you into the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and they <S%H3898>fought<s%> with you; and I <S%H5414>gave<s%> them into your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and you <S%H3423>took<s%> <S%H3423>possession<s%> of their <S%H776>land<s%> when I <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> you.

'Then <S%H1111>Balak<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6834>Zippor,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and he <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>summoned<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor<s%> to <S%H7043>curse<s%> you.
'But I was not <S%H14>willing<s%> to <S%H8085>listen<s%> to <S%H1109>Balaam.<s%> So he <S%H1288>had<s%> to <S%H1288>bless<s%> you, and I <S%H5337>delivered<s%> you from his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

'And you <S%H5674>crossed<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3405>Jericho;<s%> and the <S%H1167>citizens<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> <S%H3898>fought<s%> against you, [and] the <S%H567>Amorite<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzite<s%> and the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%> and the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%> and the <S%H1622>Girgashite,<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivite<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusite.<s%> Thus I <S%H5414>gave<s%> them into your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

'Then I <S%H7971>sent<s%> the <S%H6880>hornet<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you and it <S%H1644>drove<s%> out the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, [but] not by your <S%H2719>sword<s%> or your <S%H7198>bow.<s%>

'And I <S%H5414>gave<s%> you a <S%H776>land<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> you had not <S%H3021>labored,<s%> and <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you had not <S%H1129>built,<s%> and you have <S%H3427>lived<s%> in them; you are <S%H398>eating<s%> of <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> and <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H2132>groves<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you did not <S%H5193>plant.<s%>'

<S%H6258>"Now,<s%> therefore, <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> Him in <S%H8549>sincerity<s%> and <S%H571>truth;<s%> and <S%H5493>put<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> your fathers <S%H1>served<s%> <S%H5647>beyond<s%> the <S%H5676>River<s%> and in <S%H5104>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H4714>serve<s%> the <S%H5647>Lord.<s%>

"And <S%H518>if<s%> it is <S%H7489>disagreeable<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H977>choose<s%> for yourselves <S%H3117>today<s%> <S%H4310>whom<s%> you will <S%H5647>serve:<s%> <S%H518>whether<s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> your fathers <S%H1>served<s%> <S%H5647>which<s%> were <S%H834>beyond<s%> the <S%H5676>River,<s%> or the <S%H5104>gods<s%> of the <S%H430>Amorites<s%> in <S%H567>whose<s%> <S%H834>land<s%> you are <S%H776>living;<s%> but as for me and my <S%H3427>house,<s%> we will <S%H1004>serve<s%> the <S%H5647>Lord.<s%>"

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2486>"Far<s%> be it from us that we should <S%H5800>forsake<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods;<s%>

for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> is He who <S%H5927>brought<s%> us and our fathers up out of the <S%H1>land<s%> of <S%H776>Egypt,<s%> from the <S%H4714>house<s%> of <S%H1004>bondage,<s%> and <S%H5650>who<s%> <S%H834>did<s%> <S%H6213>these<s%> <S%H428>great<s%> <S%H1419>signs<s%> in our <S%H226>sight<s%> and <S%H5869>preserved<s%> us through <S%H8104>all<s%> the <S%H3605>way<s%> in <S%H1870>which<s%> we <S%H834>went<s%> and among <S%H1980>all<s%> the <S%H3605>peoples<s%> through <S%H5971>whose<s%> <S%H834>midst<s%> we <S%H7130>passed.<s%>

"And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1644>drove<s%> out from <S%H6440>before<s%> us <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> even the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%> We <S%H1571>also<s%> will <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> for He is our <S%H430>God.<s%>"

Then <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> "You will not be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> for He is a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%> He is a <S%H7072>jealous<s%> <S%H410>God;<s%> He will not <S%H5375>forgive<s%> your <S%H6588>transgression<s%> or your <S%H9128>sins.<s%>

<S%H3588>"If<s%> you <S%H5800>forsake<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H5236>foreign<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> then He will <S%H7725>turn<s%> and <S%H7489>do<s%> you <S%H7489>harm<s%> and <S%H3615>consume<s%> you <S%H310>after<s%> He has <S%H3190>done<s%> <S%H3190>good<s%> to you."
And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H3808>"No,<s%> but we will <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> "You are <S%H5707>witnesses<s%> against yourselves that you have <S%H977>chosen<s%> for yourselves the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> Him." And they <S%H559>said,<s%> "We are <S%H5707>witnesses.<s%>"

<S%H6258>"Now<s%> therefore, <S%H5493>put<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H5236>foreign<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are in your <S%H7130>midst,<s%> and <S%H5186>incline<s%> your <S%H3824>hearts<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"
And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> "We will <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> and we will <S%H8085>obey<s%> His <S%H6963>voice.<s%>"

So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H7760>made<s%> for them a <S%H2706>statute<s%> and an <S%H4941>ordinance<s%> in <S%H7927>Shechem.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H3789>wrote<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H430>God;<s%> and he <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H1419>large<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> and <S%H6965>set<s%> it up <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H427>oak<s%> that was by the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> shall be for a <S%H5713>witness<s%> against us, for it has <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H561>words<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to us; thus it shall be for a <S%H5713>witness<s%> against you, <S%H6435>lest<s%> you <S%H3584>deny<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>"
Then <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7971>dismissed<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> to his <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> that <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> being one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old.<s%>

And they <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in the <S%H1366>territory<s%> of his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> in Timnath-serah, <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%> of <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H1608>Gaash.<s%>

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5647>served<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H748>survived<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H310><s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> and had <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4639>deeds<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He had <S%H6213>done<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Now they <S%H6912>buried<s%> the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5927>brought<s%> up from <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> at <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> in the <S%H2513>piece<s%> of <S%H7704>ground<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> had <S%H7069>bought<s%> from the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2544>Hamor<s%> the father of <S%H1>Shechem<s%> for one <S%H7927>hundred<s%> <S%H3967>pieces<s%> of <S%H7192>money;<s%> and they <S%H7192>became<s%> the <S%H1961>inheritance<s%> of Joseph's <S%H5159>sons.<s%>

And <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H4191>died;<s%> and they <S%H6912>buried<s%> him at <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> of <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H5414>given<s%> him in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim.<s%>
